Sentencas: In this study, the valence state of Pr in Mg doped PrGaO3 perovskites was investigated.
Titulo: The Pr4+ ions in Mg doped PrGaO3 perovskites

Sentencas: It is found that Pr4+ ions are created in samples doped with low-valence ions, for example, with Mg2+.
Titulo: The Pr4+ ions in Mg doped PrGaO3 perovskites

Sentencas: The color of the doped samples changes from black to light green after being treated in H-2 atmosphere, which shows that the Pr4+ ions in the sample are reduced to Pr3+ ions.
Titulo: The Pr4+ ions in Mg doped PrGaO3 perovskites

Sentencas: The open circuit voltage of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) using PrGa0.95Mg0.05O3
Titulo: The Pr4+ ions in Mg doped PrGaO3 perovskites
